page.title: 12PUBLIC AMENITIES
page.content:
Swinford is in close proximity to M1 and M6 access points and also to Rugby Midland Station. { TRANSPORT} Public or Private {Public} i){Bus}- limited bus service between Swinford and Rugby and Market Harborough. No service to Lutterworth ii){Rail}- good inter city service from Rugby Midland Station {Private}i){Cars}- most households have one car ii){Bus}- private bus service operated by certain employers
{GAS}no gas supply to this area {ELECTRICITY}all houses have mains supply {SEWAGE DISPOSAL}treatment plant falls outside grid reference, about 4 homes use septic tanks {EDUCATION}primary school - Swinford secondary school - Lutterworth
